theorem.name: sumBT_inductive_clause

text.english: Inductive clause of the definition of \(\texttt{sumBT}\): \begin{multline} \forall t_1,t_2 \in BT_\mathbb{N}.\; \forall n \in \mathbb{N} .\\ \texttt{sumBT}(N(t_1, n, t_2)) = \texttt{sumBT}(t_1) + \texttt{sumBT}(t_2) + n \end{multline}
text.italiano: Clausola induttiva della definizione di \(\texttt{sumBT}\): \begin{multline} \forall t_1,t_2 \in BT_\mathbb{N}.\; \forall n \in \mathbb{N} .\\ \texttt{sumBT}(N(t_1, n, t_2)) = \texttt{sumBT}(t_1) + \texttt{sumBT}(t_2) + n \end{multline}

theorem.coq:
Theorem sumBT_inductive_clause : forall (t1 t2 : btn) (n : nat) , sumBT (N t1 n t2) = sumBT t1 + sumBT t2 + n.
Proof.
reflexivity.
Qed.
